definition: body odor/bromhidrosis/armpit odor/underarm stink/also called 狐臭[hu2 chou4]

sentences.english: When worn, the utility model can eliminate odors, and thus is suitable for people who have osmidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 本上衣穿在身上能除異味，特別有腋臭的人更受歡迎。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a new method of treatment of axillary bromhidrosis leaving less damage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治療腋臭的一種微創的新方法。

sentences.english: Objective: To cure bromhidrosis radically add without scars by minute incisions.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用微小切口無疤痕根治腋臭。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the medical effect between surgical treatment and microwave treatment in bromhidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較手術與微波治療腋臭的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of two different kinds of nursing after the decollement of bromhidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價腋臭剝離術後兩種護理方法的效果。

sentences.english: The medicine composition is used in preparing medicine for treating underarm odor.
sentences.chinese: 該藥物組合物在製備治療腋臭的藥物中的應用。

definition: rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose)/brandy nose
tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
common name for 花斑癣, tinea versicolor
condyloma (genital wart of viral origin)/Condyloma acuminatum
